attributes.action: Implement the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This policy would promote environmentally friendly means of transport, free up capacity on the roads, reduce the congestion that we otherwise face and avoid the gridlock that you see in many towns and cities today. 

The scheme would be fair because those who travel greater distances would pay the most. It is supported by Friends of the Earth if money raised is invested in improving alternatives to car travel

Please Mr Blair - push through road pricing in order to reduce congestion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
